p: Statistical comparisons for two-group means were made using the unpaired t-test with GraphPad Prism 8.3 (San Diego, CA). Other statistical tests are described in the text or associated figures. Where appropriate, significance was adjusted for multiple comparisons and noted in figures. Statistical significance was accepted at a p-value of less than 0.05. P-values are represented as * p < 0.05; ** p < 0.01; *** p < 0.001; **** p < 0.0001; respectively.
